about_the_game:
Scrum Down: Electrifying Challenge on the Battlefield!

Get ready for an intense and electrifying gaming experience with "Scrum Down"! In this epic team-based showdown, you choose your destiny as a cunning terrorist or a skilled military operative. Adrenaline runs high as each elimination counts, boosting your team's score and paving the way to victory.

Elite Progression

Victory isn't just an achievement; it's a climb through ranks! Level up and unlock devastating special weapons that will transform the battlefield. Armed with incredible firepower, your team will be unstoppable, wreaking havoc and leaving opponents stunned.

Special Weapons

It's not just about shooting; it's about shooting with style. With special weapons causing up to 10 times more damage, the excitement reaches explosive levels. Master these weapons to become an unstoppable force and an undisputed leader on the combat scene.

Tactical Communication

Victory is achieved not just with bullets but with sharp strategy. Use microphone communication to coordinate attacks, surprise opponents, and stand out as an unbeatable unit. Crossplayer gameplay expands your horizons, challenging teams on different platforms.

Contemporary Design and Visual Power:
Adapted for modern times, "Scrum Down" offers stunning and contemporary visual design. Immerse yourself in impressive graphics as you engage in intense and unpredictable battles.

Total Frenzy

The accelerated pulse, relentless action, and the pursuit of victory make each match an electrifying experience. This is not just a game; it's an explosion of emotions, where cooperation, strategy, and action converge in a dizzying dance on the battlefield.

Get ready for battle in "Scrum Down" - Where the electricity of combat never diminishes!

content_descriptors.notes: It includes intense violence and bloodshed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7 10G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Scrum Down: Epic Battles, Unique Classes, and Monthly Mayhem! With Assault, Engineer, Support, and Recon, evolve powerful weapons monthly. In Story Mode, discover new worlds with each phase. Constant updates bring the thrill that keeps the war's flame burning! Get ready for the unimaginable!
